title: Work Orders: Authentication Implementation

action_items.task: WO-001: Set up Passport.js OAuth infrastructure
WO-005: Set up Redis session store with ioredis
WO-006: Build login UI with Google and GitHub OAuth buttons

blockers.description: Waiting for Google Cloud OAuth credentials from IT
blockers.impact: Blocks WO-001 completion and all dependent OAuth work orders

transcript:
Work Orders for Authentication Implementation
Sprint: 12
Epic: User Authentication

These work orders implement the Authentication Architecture Blueprint. All OAuth work orders depend on the OAuth 2.0 decision from the PRD.

Note: If the OAuth requirement changes to SAML, work orders WO-001 through WO-004 and WO-006 will need to be completely rewritten.
